dcterms:creator: A. Vakanski
H.-p. Jun
D. Paul
R. Baker
dcterms:description: A dataset of human body movements for physical rehabilitation exercises, including 10 exercise types performed by 10 healthy subjects, with data collected using the Kinect sensor.
dcterms:title: University of Idaho-Physical Rehabilitation Movement Data (UI-PRMD)

dcterms:creator: A. Miron
N. Sadawi
W. Ismail
H. Hussain
C. Grosan
dcterms:description: A dataset of physical rehabilitation movements containing 9 exercise types performed by 15 patients and 14 healthy subjects, with data collected using the Kinect One sensor.
dcterms:title: IntelliRehabDS (IRDS)

dcterms:creator: M. Capecci
M. Ceravolo
F. Ferracuti
S. Iarlori
A. Monteriu
L. Romeo
F. Verdini
dcterms:description: The KIMORE dataset consists of kinematic assessments of movement and clinical scores for remote monitoring of physical rehabilitation, including 5 exercises performed by healthy subjects and patients with motor dysfunctions.
dcterms:title: KInematic assessment of MOvement and clinical scores for remote monitoring of physical REhabilitation (KIMORE)
